text: The Ricki Lake Show was an American talk show which had Ricki Lake as the host. It began on September 11, 1993 and ended on May 25, 2004. The show was similar to The Oprah Winfrey Show. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 American television series debuts Category:2004 American television series endings Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:American television talk shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Ricki Lake (1993 talk show)
